definition: to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
to cut/to slice/tangent (math)
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth

sentences.english: Don't gobble down your food. It'll make you fat if you do.
sentences.chinese: 吃东西时切忌狼吞虎咽，这可能会让你发胖。

sentences.english: At this time, avoid to defeat psychological, not tired is wise.
sentences.chinese: 此时，切忌不甘失败的心理，不恋战是明智之举。

sentences.english: It’s important to keep your cool and don’t push yourself too far.
sentences.chinese: 保持冷静切忌一步登天也非常重要。

sentences.english: However, it is best advisable to limit your declarations of love and endearments.
sentences.chinese: 但是我还是要提醒你，切忌你对爱的表达太过泛滥。
她警告我们大家切忌无知。

sentences.english: I warned him against indiscretion in his conversation.
sentences.chinese: 我告诫他谈话切忌轻率。

sentences.english: It is estimated that the lifting capacity, prohibits the overload use.
sentences.chinese: 估计起重量，切忌超载使用。

sentences.english: Also must not dry too long.
Without grabbing a handful of pretzels to munch on, I place my pretzel crust into the oven.
sentences.chinese: 把椒盐脆饼粒放进烤炉，切忌不要先抓把尝尝口味。

sentences.english: Don't use this corkscrew for plastic cork and sparking wine.
sentences.chinese: 切忌用此开瓶器开启塑胶瓶塞和汽酒。

sentences.english: Poems do not directly exposed to the expression in the mood, and let the reader can understand.
sentences.chinese: 诗歌切忌直露，要在意境中表达，并让读者能看懂。

sentences.english: Patients with pulmonary fibrosis avoid by all means is spicy food cold.
sentences.chinese: 肺纤维化患者切忌吃辛辣生冷的食物。

sentences.english: In 5, the hat plug towel, flat dry, avoid hanging to dry.
sentences.chinese: 将帽子里面塞上毛巾，平放阴干，切忌吊挂晒干。

sentences.english: The soil must not be overwatered, especially during the first few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 切忌土壤过涝，尤其在最初几周。
